scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend && npm run dev:frontend && npm run dev:php
scripts.dev:work: npm run dev:watch & npm run dev:serv
scripts.dev:backend: npm i && npm update && cd backend/node/ && npm i && npm update && cd ../../
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend/ && sudo npm install -g bower && sudo npm update -g bower && bower install && bower update && cd ../
scripts.dev:php: cd backend/php/ && composer install  && composer update && cd ../../
scripts.dev:watch: grunt babel:app & grunt copy:public --force & grunt copy:html & grunt watch:app & grunt watch:html
